name: Eliminated Pack
description: Unlocked when a faction is eliminated from the game. Adds comeback mechanics and balance adjustments.

modifiers.description: Adds mercenary territory from eliminated pack

data.title: Special Territories (Eliminated Pack)
data.summary: New special territories added with the Eliminated pack

mercenary_territory.title: Mercenary Territory
mercenary_territory.content: A special territory that generates troops each turn.

rules.text: If you control this territory at the end of your turn, add one troop to it

modifiers.description: Adds bonus for eliminated players rejoining

data.title: Eliminated Player Bonus
data.content: Players who have been eliminated and are rejoining the war receive bonuses to help them catch up.

rules.text: When Joining the War after elimination, add +2 troops to your starting amount
Draw one Resource card when successfully Joining the War

examples.scenario: Player was eliminated and Joins the War next turn
examples.explanation: Player receives (8 / 2) + 2 = 6 troops instead of 4, plus draws a Resource card

rule.text: If you eliminate the player who eliminated you, gain 1 Red Star token

changes.text: Take HALF your starting troops plus eliminated bonus (+2) and place them in a legal starting territory
